backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and global styling for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main landing page UI with logo, hero section, clickable phone links, about section, and styled content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance using Internet Identity and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication lifecycle and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining charcoal/ivory palette with gold accents and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry rendering App with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for building a static menâ€™s clothing website, including requirements, features, images, and metadata.
